name: Sprite Hunter
description:
Legend has it that thousands of years ago, humans and sprites lost after a war. So it was agreed that humans lived above the surface and sprites in the underground city. The two do not normally interact. When a few sprites break an agreement to harm the world, an ancient profession comes to the rescue world and hunts the unruly goblins, known as "sprite hunter." Play as a beautiful hunter who fights sprite in a dungeon, tied them up and locking them in cells.
· 3D game
· Fight with cold weapons
· Various moves, dodge and block
· Exquisite modeling of female protagonists
